content: I was creating an Observation.component.valueQuantity in GB2. In the form that pops up I enter 85 (without quotes) in the Value box, but the FSH that is added has "85" with quotes, which gives an error when converting to json. removing the quotes fixes it.
Ah - missed this. Thanks for picking it up!

OK - so posted an update that should fix this. @Jay Lyle - I've also added the code that will ensure that the graph is in sync with the FSH (this was causing issues for you I believe). It will only work on new projects - I can add a 'fix all' to the audit if you need it...
